body:
The cover of this doujin haunts me.

I had buried it deep within the confines of my brain, unconsciously suppressing the memory of it, hoping for it to never return.

Seeing it again unleashed what I can only describe as pure, unadulterated, primordial dread. I entered an immediate fight or flight response, as if some ancient terror not felt since the days of my earliest ancestors suddenly awoke. It triggered a level of sheer repulsion that not even dead bodies can incite.

I hate this cover. I hate it with every single atom inside my body and soul, with every last neuron of my brain. Yet, no matter what I do, no matter securely I try to lock it inside the depths of my mind, it always returns.

Fuck this cover.

HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT

It also pains me that all of these are onshot and doesn't have any sequel
Finally this is Translated this shit is goood
Damn so this meat canyons latest product after the Garfield one
